items.title: Wikipedia’s Existential Threats Feel Greater Than Ever
items.description: As the free online encyclopedia turns 25, it’s facing political opposition, AI scraping, dwindling volunteers, and a public that may no longer believe...

items.title: Lizn Hearpieces Review: Affordable but Uncomfortable Hearing Aids
items.description: These odd-looking hearing aids double as solid earbuds, but comfort is a major issue.

items.title: Our Favorite Coway Air Purifiers Are on Sale (2026)
items.description: Breathe easier with these discounts on one of WIRED’s favorite air purifier brands, including an option for large rooms.

items.title: Microsoft taps India’s Varaha for durable carbon removal offtake
items.description: Microsoft is buying over 100,000 tons of carbon dioxide removal credits from India's Varaha over the next three years.

items.title: Mira Murati’s startup, Thinking Machines Lab, is losing two of its co-founders to OpenAI
items.description: The abrupt change in personnel was in the works for several weeks, according to an OpenAI executive.
